verses.verse: Now these be the last <S%H314><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>. David <S%H1732><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jesse <S%H3448><s%> said <S%H5002><s%>, and the man <S%H1397><s%> who was raised up <S%H6965><s%> on high <S%H5920><s%>, the anointed <S%H4899><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, and the sweet <S%H5273><s%> psalmist <S%H2158><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, said <S%H5002><s%>,
The Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> by me, and his word <S%H4405><s%> was in my tongue <S%H3956><s%>.

The God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, the Rock <S%H6697><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> to me, He that ruleth <S%H4910><s%> over men <S%H120><s%> must be just <S%H6662><s%>, ruling <S%H4910><s%> in the fear <S%H3374><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>. He: or, Be thou ruler, etc

And he shall be as the light <S%H216><s%> of the morning <S%H1242><s%>, when the sun <S%H8121><s%> riseth <S%H2224><s%>, even a morning <S%H1242><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> clouds <S%H5645><s%>; as the tender grass <S%H1877><s%> springing out of the earth <S%H776><s%> by clear shining <S%H5051><s%> after rain <S%H4306><s%>.

Although my house <S%H1004><s%> be not so with God <S%H410><s%>; yet he hath made <S%H7760><s%> with me an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%>, ordered <S%H6186><s%> in all things, and sure <S%H8104><s%>: for this is all my salvation <S%H3468><s%>, and all my desire <S%H2656><s%>, although he make it not to grow <S%H6779><s%>.
But the sons of Belial <S%H1100><s%> shall be all of them as thorns <S%H6975><s%> thrust away <S%H5074><s%>, because they cannot be taken <S%H3947><s%> with hands <S%H3027><s%>:

But the man <S%H376><s%> that shall touch <S%H5060><s%> them must be fenced <S%H4390><s%> with iron <S%H1270><s%> and the staff <S%H6086><s%> of a spear <S%H2595><s%>; and they shall be utterly <S%H8313><s%> burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%> in the same place <S%H7675><s%>. fenced: Heb. filled

These be the names <S%H8034><s%> of the mighty men <S%H1368><s%> whom David <S%H1732><s%> had: The Tachmonite <S%H8461><s%> that sat <S%H3427><s%> in the seat <S%H7675><s%> <S%H3429><s%>, chief <S%H7218><s%> among the captains <S%H7991><s%>; the same was Adino <S%H5722><s%> the Eznite <S%H6112><s%>: he lift up his spear against eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>, whom he slew <S%H2491><s%> at one <S%H259><s%> time <S%H6471><s%>. The Tachmonite: or, Joshebbassebet the Tachmonite, head of the three. whom he: Heb. slain. he lift: See 1. Ch.11.11. whom he: Heb. slain

And after <S%H310><s%> him was Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Dodo <S%H1734><s%> the Ahohite <S%H266><s%>, one of the three <S%H7969><s%> mighty men <S%H1368><s%> with David <S%H1732><s%>, when they defied <S%H2778><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> that were there gathered together <S%H622><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%>, and the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were gone away <S%H5927><s%>:

He arose <S%H6965><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> until <S%H3588><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> was weary <S%H3021><s%>, and his hand <S%H3027><s%> clave <S%H1692><s%> unto the sword <S%H2719><s%>: and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> wrought <S%H6213><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> victory <S%H8668><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%>; and the people <S%H5971><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him only to spoil <S%H6584><s%>.

And after <S%H310><s%> him was Shammah <S%H8048><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Agee <S%H89><s%> the Hararite <S%H2043><s%>. And the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> were gathered together <S%H622><s%> into a troop <S%H2416><s%>, where was a piece <S%H2513><s%> of ground <S%H7704><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> of lentiles <S%H5742><s%>: and the people <S%H5971><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%> from <S%H6440><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>. into: or, for foraging

But he stood <S%H3320><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the ground <S%H2513><s%>, and defended <S%H5337><s%> it, and slew <S%H5221><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>: and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> wrought <S%H6213><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> victory <S%H8668><s%>.

And three <S%H7969><s%> <S%H7970><s%> of the thirty <S%H7970><s%> chief <S%H7218><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> in the harvest time <S%H7105><s%> unto the cave <S%H4631><s%> of Adullam <S%H5725><s%>: and the troop <S%H2416><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> pitched <S%H2583><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Rephaim <S%H7497><s%>. three: or, the three captains over the thirty
And David <S%H1732><s%> was then in an hold <S%H4686><s%>, and the garrison <S%H4673><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> was then in Bethlehem <S%H1035><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> longed <S%H183><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Oh that one would give me drink <S%H8248><s%> of the water <S%H4325><s%> of the well <S%H953><s%> of Bethlehem <S%H1035><s%>, which is by the gate <S%H8179><s%>!

And the three <S%H7969><s%> mighty men <S%H1368><s%> brake through <S%H1234><s%> the host <S%H4264><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, and drew <S%H7579><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> out of the well <S%H953><s%> of Bethlehem <S%H1035><s%>, that was by the gate <S%H8179><s%>, and took <S%H5375><s%> it, and brought <S%H935><s%> it to David <S%H1732><s%>: nevertheless he would <S%H14><s%> not drink <S%H8354><s%> thereof, but poured it out <S%H5258><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Be it far <S%H2486><s%> from me, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, that I should do <S%H6213><s%> this: is not this the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> that went <S%H1980><s%> in jeopardy of their lives <S%H5315><s%>? therefore he would <S%H14><s%> not drink <S%H8354><s%> it. These things did <S%H6213><s%> these three <S%H7969><s%> mighty men <S%H1368><s%>.

And Abishai <S%H52><s%>, the brother <S%H251><s%> of Joab <S%H3097><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zeruiah <S%H6870><s%>, was chief <S%H7218><s%> among three <S%H7992><s%>. And he lifted up <S%H5782><s%> his spear <S%H2595><s%> against three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>, and slew <S%H2491><s%> them, and had the name <S%H8034><s%> among three <S%H7969><s%>. and slew them: Heb. slain
Was he not most honourable <S%H3513><s%> of three <S%H7969><s%>? therefore he was their captain <S%H8269><s%>: howbeit he attained <S%H935><s%> not unto the first three <S%H7969><s%>.

And Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoiada <S%H3077><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of a valiant <S%H2428><s%> man <S%H376><s%> <S%H381><s%>, of Kabzeel <S%H6909><s%>, who had done many <S%H7227><s%> acts <S%H6467><s%>, he slew <S%H5221><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> lionlike men <S%H739><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>: he went down <S%H3381><s%> also and slew <S%H5221><s%> a lion <S%H738><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of a pit <S%H953><s%> in time <S%H3117><s%> of snow <S%H7950><s%>: who: Heb. great of acts lionlike: Heb. lion of God

And he slew <S%H2026><s%> an Egyptian <S%H4713><s%>, a goodly <S%H4758><s%> man <S%H376><s%>: and the Egyptian <S%H4713><s%> had a spear <S%H2595><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>; but he went down <S%H3381><s%> to him with a staff <S%H7626><s%>, and plucked <S%H1497><s%> the spear <S%H2595><s%> out of the Egyptian's <S%H4713><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and slew <S%H5221><s%> him with his own spear <S%H2595><s%>. a goodly: Heb. a man of countenance, or, sight: called I. Chr. I.23. a man of great stature
These things did <S%H6213><s%> Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoiada <S%H3077><s%>, and had the name <S%H8034><s%> among three <S%H7969><s%> mighty men <S%H1368><s%>.

He was more honourable <S%H3513><s%> than the thirty <S%H7970><s%>, but he attained <S%H935><s%> not to the first three <S%H7969><s%>. And David <S%H1732><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> him over his guard <S%H4928><s%>. more: or, honourable among the thirty guard: or, council: Heb. at his command
Asahel <S%H6214><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Joab <S%H3097><s%> was one of the thirty <S%H7970><s%>; Elhanan <S%H445><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Dodo <S%H1734><s%> of Bethlehem <S%H1035><s%>,
Shammah <S%H8048><s%> the Harodite <S%H2733><s%>, Elika <S%H470><s%> the Harodite <S%H2733><s%>,
Helez <S%H2503><s%> the Paltite <S%H6407><s%>, Ira <S%H5896><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ikkesh <S%H6142><s%> the Tekoite <S%H8621><s%>,
Abiezer <S%H44><s%> the Anethothite <S%H6069><s%>, Mebunnai <S%H4012><s%> the Hushathite <S%H2843><s%>,
Zalmon <S%H6756><s%> the Ahohite <S%H266><s%>, Maharai <S%H4121><s%> the Netophathite <S%H5200><s%>,

Heleb <S%H2460><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Baanah <S%H1196><s%>, a Netophathite <S%H5200><s%>, Ittai <S%H863><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ribai <S%H7380><s%> out of Gibeah <S%H1390><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>,
Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> the Pirathonite <S%H6553><s%>, Hiddai <S%H1914><s%> of the brooks <S%H5158><s%> of Gaash <S%H1608><s%>, brooks: or, valleys
Abialbon <S%H45><s%> the Arbathite <S%H6164><s%>, Azmaveth <S%H5820><s%> the Barhumite <S%H1273><s%>,
Eliahba <S%H455><s%> the Shaalbonite <S%H8170><s%>, of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jashen <S%H3464><s%>, Jonathan <S%H3083><s%>,
Shammah <S%H8048><s%> the Hararite <S%H2043><s%>, Ahiam <S%H279><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Sharar <S%H8325><s%> the Hararite <S%H2043><s%>,

Eliphelet <S%H467><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahasbai <S%H308><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of the Maachathite <S%H4602><s%>, Eliam <S%H463><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahithophel <S%H302><s%> the Gilonite <S%H1526><s%>,
Hezrai <S%H2695><s%> the Carmelite <S%H3761><s%>, Paarai <S%H6474><s%> the Arbite <S%H701><s%>,
Igal <S%H3008><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nathan <S%H5416><s%> of Zobah <S%H6678><s%>, Bani <S%H1137><s%> the Gadite <S%H1425><s%>,

Zelek <S%H6768><s%> the Ammonite <S%H5984><s%>, Naharai <S%H5171><s%> the Beerothite <S%H886><s%>, armourbearer <S%H5375><s%> <S%H3627><s%> to Joab <S%H3097><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zeruiah <S%H6870><s%>,
Ira <S%H5896><s%> an Ithrite <S%H3505><s%>, Gareb <S%H1619><s%> an Ithrite <S%H3505><s%>,
Uriah <S%H223><s%> the Hittite <S%H2850><s%>: thirty <S%H7970><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> in all.
